name: radish
title: Radish
description: Pink root-crop with green leaves. Is fast and easy to grow, but has bitter taste.

name: turnip
title: Turnip
description: Large yellow root-crop with green leaves. Grows fast, but not everyone likes its taste.

name: wheat
title: Wheat
description: Tall grass which produce grain. Its decent yield made it main ration component in most societies.

name: cabbage
title: Cabbage
description: Large vegetable with meaty leaves. Takes moderate time to grow and provides good amount of food.

name: pumpkin
title: Pumpkin
description: Long-growing orange vegetables, known for its mild sweet taste.

name: tomato
title: Tomato
description: Fragile red fruit valued by cooks. Long growing time and relatively low yields are compensated by delicious taste.
